p: A significant negative correlation ( R 2 = 0.67, P < 0.025) was identified between germination rates and soil depth, with fewer seeds germinating in soils obtained from deeper soil core layers (Fig. 1). Very few seeds germinated from soil depths below 20 cm (1–2 seeds/layer), and only three seeds germinated from the 8–10 cm soil depth; therefore, these layers were not included in the analysis.
